tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CalibrationSettings(
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  setting_name VARCHAR(50),
  parameter_type VARCHAR(50),
  parameter_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE calibration_settings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  parameter_name VARCHAR(50),
  parameter_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_parameters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    calibration_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (calibration_id) REFERENCES calibration_settings(id)
);

CREATE TABLE calibration_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    calibration_id INT,
    calibration_date TIMESTAMP,
    successful BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (calibration_id) REFERENCES calibration_settings(id)
);

CREATE TABLE calibration_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    calibration_id INT,
    calibration_date TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (calibration_id) REFERENCES calibration_settings(id)
);
